issue.title: Cloudsim in cloud does not support multiple drones on tunnel_circuit_practicel_01

content.raw:
I’ll try to isolate and reproduce the problem, but I need a little bit of clarification so questions below.

Are these `tunnel_circuit_practice_01` vs `simple_tunnel_02` runs in the Cloudsim?  Or, do you get the same behavior locally using with `docker-compose`?

Does this happen with all `tunnel_circuit_practice` or just `tunnel_circuit_practicel_01`?
